short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set email reminders for LeetCode problems

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost your coding productivity with this extension.
1) Smart Reminders: Got stuck on a question? Whether you watched a YouTube tutorial, checked a solution, or just found it really tough, set reminders to revisit it in 1 day, 7 days, or 14 days.
2) Compatible Everywhere: Works seamlessly with platforms like LeetCode, HackerRank, HackerEarth, InterviewBit, GeeksforGeeks, and more!
3) Boost Confidence: Stay consistent, revisit tough problems, and walk into coding interviews fully prepared.

Designed for students and coders aiming to ace their skills. Install it today and level up your preparation!
